title: Ro Khanna takes Silicon Valley to West Virginia
description: Rep. Ro Khanna (D-Calif.) sits down with Chuck Todd to talk about the “Internet Bill of Rights” his trip to rural America, and why he sometimes has a kind word for President Trump.
author: nbcnews.podcasts@gmail.com (NBC News)
